first_story_block: One night, you were sleeping when you heard muffled screams coming from your sisters' room.  Alerted, you jump up and run there as quietly as you can.  There, you see a cloaked figure holding your sister.  He jumps into a portal that is next to him.

action_results.result: You arw tumbling through the air, vert scared. Suddenly, you land in the middle of a dark forest. You see a cottage with light in the windows and laughter coming from inside. It sounded nice.

You look inside and see a bunch of witches laughing together around a cauldron.

Suddenly the door opened, and one of the witches looked outside. She grabbed you by the collar and took you inside the house.

"Who are you? Why are you here?" one of them asks.

You tell them your story and they cackle.

"A portal?" one of them asks. "Like this one?"

She waves her hand and a portal appears, through which you can see your bedroom. Suddenly, you realize that the witch holding you loosened her grip.
You make a mad dash to the portal, kicking all of the witches that get in your way. You dive through the portal and land on your sister's empty bed. Anove you, it starts dissapearing.

You watch as the portal dissapears. You are back in your house. All is well. Your life continues normally.

But without your sister.

You come to a crossroad. The path to the right leads to a castle and the path to the left leads to a goblin cave, according to the sign.


"Do you need any help?" a voice asks behind you.


You turn around to see a fairy floating in the air. Her skin was laveder, but her eyes, dress and hair were a darker hue of the same color.


"I suppose... Who are you?"


"I am Violet, the purple fairy of these crossroads. I help travelers who are lost. Are you in need of my assistance?"


"Yes... I am searching for my sister. She was kidnapped by a cloaked figure. Where would I find her?"


"That would be the goblin cave. Goblins are wicked creatures! Stealing children is their favorite thing to do!"


"Thank you! I have chosen my path."

You decide to listen to the fairy and hed to the govlin cave. You soon approach it. Is looks a bit like a gaping mouth ready to swallow you whole. You take a deep breath and go inside.

"Why are you here?" one of them asks.

"I need to find my sister! She was kidnapped!"

"Stupid girl. Your sister is in the castle. Why are you here?"

"But the purple fairy..."

"She is the most evil of all villans! Well, that is an exaggeration, of course, but she is not on your side!"

"Maybe we really should let her go."

"Would you rather go through a room on fire completely, a room with a giant drop, or with vicious tigers that haven't eaten for a month?"

You soon approach the castle, a large and elaborate building that doesn't look evil.  Now you have to find out how to enter.

You climb through the window and find yourself inside the castle.  You creep down the hallway until you are in front of the throne room.  He is positioned so that he doesn't see you.  You listen to him talk and find out that he is on a mission to erase the mind of all the kids in the human world!  Your sister is in the dungeon, to which the keys are hanging behind the king. 


You try to get the keys, but are spotted by the king, a beefy man with red hair and tatoos.


"Who are you and why are you here?" he asks meanly.

"You are also from the real world?  We are kidnapping children from there so that we can erase their memory and make them live here, in this magic world, FOREVER!  Your sister is here.  The ceremony is going to be in an hour.  Have fun!  Take her to the dungeon, guards."


They do as the kind told them, and you are thrown into a dark dungeon.


"Hello?" you cry out.


"Is that you?" asks your sister's voice.


"Yes, it is."  You tell her your story and she tells you hers, but she doesn't know anything that you don't.  You two spend the next hour trying to escape.  It was no use.


Finally, it is time for the ceremony.  The guards take you two out.  It is your sister's turn first.  She is being held by a guard.  You are too, a couple meters away from her.  The Chief Wizard, who will be performing the spell, is ready.


He raises his staff.

"Run!" you cry.

You two run to the woods where you first landed.  There, you see a witch with one purple and one brown eye.


"I know what you want," she nodded.  "And I will help you."


She waved her hand and a portal appeared.  You took your sister's hand and stepped into the portal.  Both of you landed into her empty bed. 


Then you lived the rest of your life normally.
